snippet: A 43-year-old man was pulled out of the water not far from the finish line at Ross Dock on the New Jersey side of the river on Saturday.
abstract: Athlete competing in New York City’s first Ironman triathlon dies during the 2.4-mile swim in the Hudson River, the first stage in the grueling 140-mile race.
lead_paragraph: A 43-year-old man was pulled out of the water not far from the finish line at Ross Dock on the New Jersey side of the river on Saturday.

headline.seo: Man Dies During Swim Leg of Ironman Triathlon
headline.main: Athlete Dies Competing in Swim Leg of Triathlon
headline.print_headline: Athlete Dies Competing In Swim Leg Of Triathlon
